author: Natasha Bertrand, Gabby Orr, Daniel Lippman and Nahal Toosi
title: Pence task force freezes coronavirus aid amid backlash
description: The review came after officials discovered that aid to foreign countries wasn't being coordinated with U.S. requests.
content: Though some requests have already been processed and supplies were delivered, the review process has effectively frozen already-approved coronavirus-related PPE aid to at least 13 countries, including Vietnam, Bangladesh, Honduras and the Philippines. Nor hav… [+5258 chars]
